name: blog-hugo
description: Henrik's blog using static site engine Hugo

scripts.js:build:prod: browserify assets/scripts/main.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] | uglifyjs -mc > assets/site-bundle.js
scripts.build:assets: npm run clean && npm run js:build:prod
scripts.serve: npm run js:build && concurrently --kill-others "npm run js:watch" "npm run hugo:watch"
scripts.start: npm run clean && npm run js:build && hugo && npm run serve
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run clean:public && hugo version && hugo && npm run index:prod

author: Henrik Sommerfeld
